reviewText: These DVD's will keep you laughing for hours.  Our whole family will sit down and watch these episodes over and over.  We can't seem to get enough.  Highly recommended!!  :)

Corner Gas is a wonderful Canadian comedy that has  quirky characters bumbling thru life in the middle of nowhere.  The humor is very droll and the characters all have their foibles and their redeaming virtues but life always seems to come at them from an angle.  The commentary tracks and the special features are great at explaining how this show came about and why the cast seems to have such a connection with one another.  A lot of guest stars show up in cameo roles, many of them though are Canadian and the commentary track helps explain who they are for an American audience although some of them are self explanatory.  I'm definately going to buy seasons 4, 5 and 6.

The first time I saw this show was when my sister brought home the first season after her trip to Canada a few years ago. After rolling with laughter throughout every episode we searched for the other seasons on-line. They are a bit hard to come by, but eventually we found all 3.
